fields.description: The year the measurement was taken
The day the measurement was taken
The month the measurement was taken
The average temperature from that day in Celsius
The average temperature uncertainty in Celsius
The country where the measurement was taken

card.description: A dataset with historical land temperature data by month, year, and country.

context.potentialUses: Predict the average temperature for a country in a given month.
context.potentialMisuses: Cannot, using KNN regression, successfully be used to predict things like future temperature rises.
